phrases: One's a Red Whistle... and the other one...
does not even seem to be a cave raider...
So this is the Seeker Camp, huh?
It is really quite high up there...
I heard the Seeker Camp always has a lookout on duty.
So when someone starts approaching, I was told they lower the gondola for them...
Reg, are you able to stretch your arm up there?
Let us give it a try.
So she is still alive... that brat.
True secrets do not lie concealed in the darkness of night or in clever traps,
but rather are hidden deep within people.
By spending many moons in such an isolated place,
and they gradually transform into strange enigmas...
Although the strain is somewhat lightened around here,
I suspect that was still hard on children such as yourselves.
Oh, I see the boy is doing fine.
Now that I have seen her up close...
I bet she is over two meters tall...
How does she smooth it down to get it to look like that?
This woman must be the White Whistle...
Sono me o tomoshibi yori kagayakasete
I Am About To kotae ga mitsukaru nara zenbu nakushitemo ii
Sono koe o hanasanai youni kodama ga mada hibiiteru
This whistle... to think that I would actually see it again...
Um... you must be Ozen... right?!
I heard you are the one who found that whistle.
I heard about it from Leader!
He said when I was born in the Abyss, I was placed in a Curse-Repelling Vessel,
and then, together with my mother, you carried me to the surface!
and along the way I thought about just abandoning you many times.
We even had to leave behind that precious Bell.
If only I had left you there, that kid would have come with me.
Such a pity I did what I did.
You are a Red Whistle, right?
You should know it is not allowed... coming to a place like this.
So that is why Reg and I are going to the bottom of the netherworld!
So, uh, as soon as I ask some things about my mother, we will be gone before you know it...
And you deduce that makes it okay for you to come here?
That said, I am quite interested in how a Red Whistle even managed to make it down here.
Listen to what these kids have to say.
You want ME to do that?
Should be easier for children to talk to a fellow child.
I still have some things to attend to, you see.
I will hear you out tomorrow.
Well, both of you, here you are...
It would be a pain to keep having to explain to other cave raiders why a couple of Red Whistles are here.
As a bit of insurance, I will be holding onto this.
I will exchange it for those blue whistles when you leave.
And make sure to really give your bodies a good scrub...
I cannot stand how bad you reek of vomit.
First of all, I will show you around a bit.
This Seeker Camp has been built within the hollows of a tree called a Great Porta.
Even now, construction to expand the interior frame is still progressing little by little.
I hear the roots of this Great Porta extend outside the Abyss...
stretching all the way to the seafloor.
The roots take in nutrients that have accumulated on the seafloor,
so the tree can grow this big even though only limited light is reflected by the force field here.
This wall right there is the inside of a tree hollow.
I wonder if it will not grow too big and end up getting all tangled up...
It is actually used for washing Relics, though...
I am going to get nice and clean!
Are not they also called Eternal Fortunes?
Reg, I know you are a robot, but there is something strange about you...
Until Riko told me, I thought you were a human.
So, I was a bit surprised when I saw your arms extend like that.
I do not really even think of myself as a robot...
What the heck am I in the first place...?
Is it okay if I call you that?
Actually, I also have something I find strange...
Ask away, and I will answer if I can!
So you have it tough too, then!
Seems we both have our share of troubles!
I have not had anything that bad done to me!
Oh, I see you two are getting on well!
Sorry, Reg, I need something to dry off with...
I will go get a change of clothes!
These are leftovers, but go right ahead...
Marulk, you are about my age, but I see you are already a Blue Whistle.
Usually you cannot become a Blue Whistle until you turn 15...
but it seems being a personal apprentice of a White Whistle makes me a special case.
Right after I had an accident and collapsed, Master found me and took me in.
And I have been here ever since.
You have no plans to return to the surface?
I am sensitive to sunlight, so I cannot live up on the surface.
Ever since Master took me in, I have offered my services as a sentry here at the Seeker Camp.
I was told that would make it so that I will not have to return to the surface time after time...
Of course, it is probably also something she wants deep down.
I truly have been treated well here...
She seems kind of scary, but she is a good master, huh?!
What is with the Relics you have got in this room?
Riko's started playing around with them...
Those will not be brought up to the surface, anyway.
Those are the ones left over after sorting various Relics collected in this area...
They are grade-4 Relics, you see.
So these are grade-4 Relics, then!
This one here is my Sun Sphere.
Although it is similar, the one found down here has a more complex shape.
I hear that Relics tend to have more complex shapes the deeper down they are found.
About forty percent of the Relics collected around here are egg-shaped ones.
Even though they are tools used by people in the distant past...
They are mysterious, are not they?
If you were to stay here longer, I am sure you could do some cave raiding.
I will go ask Master if it is okay!
So will not you please stay a bit longer and cave raid around here?
It is the first time kids around my age have come here...
I would like to spend more time with you two so we can work together and such.
I would also like to do that!
My mother's at the bottom of the netherworld, and I still do not know how she is doing...
So, I am not sure whether or not I should be hurrying down there...
Since I am not sure, I have to hurry.
Well then, let us chat as much as we can today.
That is what my master has instructed me to do, anyway!
I used to do that too until a couple of years ago.
But, Riko, why was it MY bed that you wet?
I-I did my best to find the toilet!
when I woke up in the middle of the night and looked for it...
It did not seem of this world...
So I dove into Reg's bed and that is when...
We have never had any reports of ghosts here at the Seeker Camp.
Living creatures that look like corpses and stuff...
That kind of stuff was not even in Mother's sealed letter, you know!
Sounds like you are having an interesting conversation here.
It is not a matter of you not noticing,
it is more that neither that kid nor Hablog told you anything, huh?
Um, what are you talking about...?
Otherwise, you best forget what you saw.
This morning, I heard from Marulk all about you two.
Just to confirm, you are trying to follow Lyza's trail, correct?
My mother has called for me!
Did not this thing reach the surface?
Your journey to chase after your mother ends here.
Ozen, where exactly did you find that whistle and the sealed letter?
How many days ago was it, I wonder...
In the far reaches of the Goblet of Giants, there is this cluster of Eternal Fortunes, you see...
and a grave had been dug there.
You know, Lyza always liked that place.
But, Mother is calling for me-
I do not know how such a thing got mixed in there,
but Lyza would not write something like that even as a joke.
What was your reason for aiming for the bottom of the netherworld again?
I-I want to go and check for myself...
Are you going to dig up her grave?
What about the connection between Reg and the mysterious figure mentioned in the letter...?
You have followed me here because you want to know, right?
Sora ni ukanderu hikaru nami o
Tabanete niji no hashi o kakeyou
Kimi no hidarite, boku no migite o
Kako mo i am about to mo mirai mo
Kimi to issho ni iretara, sekai wa kagayakidasu yo
Saihate no chi ni saku hana o sagasou
